page.title: 06TRAVELLING IN THE 1980'S.
page.content: A survey of some of the children at Berry Hill Middle School showed that the most common form of transport is the car.Over 80% of those questioned had at least one car in the family. It also showed that almost three quarters of the children have been on a train,87% in this country and the rest abroad. It tells us to that 52% have been on a ferry.The most popular place to go by ferry is to France 15% went there.The second most popular place is the Isle of Wight.62% of those questioned have not been on a hover craft.
